title: Two-wheeler sales in sweet spot again as rural demand picks up
description: Registrations of motorcycles, scooters and mopeds - a proxy for retail sales - increased by 12.3% to 3,978,169 units last quarter and by 16.6% to 4,704,713 units in the previous three months ended December 31, 2022, show data compiled by the Federation of Automobile Dealers Association (FADA) from the Vahan portal of the ministry of road, transport & highways (MoRTH).
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
